message.body: Francesco has accepted Jesus as his savior. Seems legit ~~~ugh
Ugh francesco what are you doing
Laaaaaæme
WILLIE I NEED YOUR INTELLECT
A debate
Omgggg for what?
I'm on the affirmative side about whether the president should be allowed to have autonomous power during war
Oooooh a debate about what
Come up with questions for the refuting side
That is my job I have to speech
No speech
Hmmm ok. What do you need to do
Ok. So you already have your speech written
Ohhhh. Ok. So you have to think about what the negative might have as an argument against you and then find flaws with it. Do you know what they will be arguing?
Nope
They will probably come up with cases is history when the president screwed up
Probably. They might say something about how when the president is given too much power he can become a dictator or it could throw off the checks and balances of our government and destroy America.
I could say the president has too many advisors to be totalitarian

Mhmm. Or you could say that the normal democratic process for wartime decisions is too lengthy and that it is much more efficient to have one person in charge than to have to go through congress. Cite examples of things congress took too long to do (ie. healthcare, the debt ceiling, etc)

Also, presidents known for excess use of executive power: Abraham Lincoln, Andrew Jackson, FDR. What do they all have in common? They are regarded as some of the best presidents in our history, and they all won the wars they were fighting
They had chutzpah
And balls
Wow thanks. If u ever need this lowly junior in his last week of school for your schoolwork u just ask
Sad I wrote my last essay of junior year today :)
Haha thanks, I'll remember that. I'm currently writing my last essay of high school :')
Yayyyy! Finally a senior! Now we can talk about college applications all day long
I finalized my list last week and u of course probs want to hear it
Obvs. It's so impressive that you have a list already. My first list was like 30 schools in mid September and it changed about 80 times, not finalized till December
Here is the list in no specific order
AU, babson, Bentley, bc, bu, Brandeis, Connecticut college, Ithaca, NYu, northeastern, skidmore, cuse, and Wesleyan
Nice! They are all northeastern though. No Emory?
No south for me. Nice emoticon
Yeah that's cool. I was all about the northeast at first. I never would have thought I'd go below the Mason-Dixon line
I don't mind the prospect of going south but the travel is a bit too much
I googled best colleges in the south. Emory at 7 not bad
Take that Transylvania university
Wooooot. US News and World Report gave us #20 in the nation, I'll take it
Shubham @ATLSWÄG
Yayayayay I can't wait. I feel really bad for ditching Emmanuel though
I think he's alright. He is going to his dream school and mike Allen will be there
I know I'm really happy for him
All of my friends got into such great schools
Emory, Newhouse, ucla, gw, bu, Harvard, claremont McKenna, duke, the list goes on
Wow you have some smart ass friends
The top half of my school is really successful, the other 75-85% go to community college or state schools
